original_text:
the prophecy of one who hears the words of God,
    who has knowledge from the Most High,
who sees a vision from the Almighty,
    who falls prostrate, and whose eyes are opened:
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 자가 말하며 지극히 높으신 자의 지식을 아는 자, 전능자의 환상을 보는 자, 엎드려서 눈을 뜬 자가 말하기를

sentences.original_text: the prophecy of one who hears the words of God,
who has knowledge from the Most High,
who sees a vision from the Almighty,
